channel.title: Smith npc then drop and attk
channel.description: ok well i did this tut you can smith npc's then drop em and they get attable but when i drop em they go str8 to my auto spawn list and then they respawn because they go to auto spawn any help?

item.title: Smith npc then drop and attk
item.dc:creator: @monsha monsha
item.description:
@monsha wrote:

set the npc drop as an item drop that way, when you kill it, it shouldn’t respawn and go into the autospawn.cfg file. just a suggestion though.

Read full topic
item.source: Smith npc then drop and attk
